attributes.action:
Stop the pay per a mile road tax !!
This is an ridiculous charge !!
attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to stop anymore taxing to the motorist as its already out of hand and to expensive.
Also rule out forever this stupid charge per mile idea.
attributes.background:
If labour brings this in it will put thousands of people out of work.
Driving Instructor's, Van Drivers, Company car drivers etc etc.
Its about time the government did the right thing and killed this idea.
You are supposed to get people into work and not take jobs away.

rejection.details:
A pay-per-mile road tax for all vehicles is not in operation in the way implied by this petition. 

You could start a new petition related to the Electric Vehicle Excise Duty, or respond to the consultation on this issue (Deadline: 11:59pm on 18 March 2026): https://www.gov.uk/government/consultations/consultation-on-the-introduction-of-electric-vehicle-excise-duty-eved
